abort.no_vins_found: No vehicles found for your account.

error.invalid_redirect_uri: Invalid redirect URI. It should start with 'msauth://prod.lynkco.app.crisp.prod/'
error.missing_details: Missing required information. Please try again.
error.login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

redirect_login.title: Lynk & Co Login
redirect_login.description:
**Step 1:** Click the link below to open Lynk & Co login:

[Open Lynk & Co Login]({auth_url})

**Step 2:** Log in with your Lynk & Co account (email, password, and complete any verification).

**Step 3:** After login, your browser will try to redirect to a URL starting with `msauth://...` - this will fail to open (that's expected).

**Step 4:** Copy the **entire URL** from your browser's address bar and paste it below.

reauth.title: Re-authentication Required
reauth.description: Your Lynk & Co session has expired. Please log in again.

data.dark_hours_end: End of dark hours interval (not automatic updates during interval)
data.dark_hours_start: Start of dark hours interval (not automatic updates during interval)
data.experimental: Enable experimental features (use at your own risk)
